VIZALITY_CUTIE_TIER_1_DESC: Get a **fully customizable role** on Vizality's server, and **custom colors** for Vizality's profile badges.
VIZALITY_CUTIE_TIER_2_DESC: Get a **fully customizable** custom badge on your profile.
VIZALITY_CUTIE_TIER_3_DESC: Get a **fully customizable** badge for **one** of your servers.
VIZALITY_CUTIE_TIER_EASTER_DESC: **Vizality Developers** will visit you wherever you live to **hug you**.
VIZALITY_I18N_CONTRIBUTE: Psst! Want to help translate Vizality? Go to our [Weblate]({weblateUrl})!
VIZALITY_LINKING_ERRORED: An error occurred. Check console for more details, and please [report it]({newIssueUrl}) if it occurs again.
VIZALITY_LINKING_TIMED_OUT: Linking flow timed out :( Maybe try again?
VIZALITY_LINKING_UNLINKED: You haven't linked your account yet.
VIZALITY_PLUGINS_DISABLE_NOTE: This will disable the following plugins:
VIZALITY_PLUGINS_ENABLE_NOTE: This will enable the following plugins:
VIZALITY_PLUGINS_PERMISSIONS_FS: Read and write files on your computer
VIZALITY_PLUGINS_UNINSTALL_SURE: Are you sure you want to uninstall {pluginCount, plural, =1 {this plugin} other {these plugins}}?
VIZALITY_QUICKCSS_SETTINGS_CLOSE_BRACKET: Will auto-close brackets and quotes when typed.
VIZALITY_QUICKCSS_SETTINGS_INDENT_WARNIN: Indentation size cannot be changed in a popped out window due to technical restrictions.
VIZALITY_QUICKCSS_SETTINGS_MATCH_BRACKET: Will highlight matching brackets whenever the cursor is next to them.
VIZALITY_SETTINGS_ADVANCED_DESC: Don't touch stuff in here if you don't know what you're doing. Unexpected things can happen to your cat.
VIZALITY_SETTINGS_BACKEND_DESC: URL used to fetch some assets and to query Vizality's REST API.
VIZALITY_SETTINGS_CACHE_DISCORD_DESC: Removes everything stored in Discord's cache folder. This will temporarily make Discord feel slower, as all resources will have to be fetched again.
VIZALITY_SETTINGS_CACHE_VIZALITY_DESC: Clears Vizality's cache. Next restart might feel slower as some files will have to be built again.
VIZALITY_SETTINGS_DEBUG_LOGS_DESC: Saves console contents to a file. Useful for debugging if Discord is crashing unexpectedly.
VIZALITY_SETTINGS_DISCORD_EXPERIMENTS_DE: ****WARNING:**** Enabling this gives you access to features that can be detected by Discord and may result in an ****account termination****. Vizality is **not responsible** for what you do with this feature. Leave it disabled if you are unsure. The Vizality Team will **not** provide any support regarding any experiment.
VIZALITY_SETTINGS_EXP_WEB_PLATFORM_DESC: Enables Chromium's experimental Web Platform features that are in development, such as CSS "backdrop-filter". Since features are in development you may encounter issues and APIs may change at any time. **Requires restart**.
VIZALITY_SETTINGS_NO_CLYDE_DESC: Replaces [Clyde]({discordiaUrl}) in Vizality commands with a mixed range of avatars and usernames selected by plug-in developers - fallbacks to "Vizality" by default.
VIZALITY_SETTINGS_OVERLAY_DESC: Opens a DevTools window that lets you inspect what's happening within Discord's in-game overlay.
VIZALITY_SETTINGS_RESTART: This setting requires you to restart Discord to take effect. Do you want to restart Discord now?
VIZALITY_SETTINGS_SYNC_DESC: Sync all of your Vizality settings between devices. Requires a Vizality account!
VIZALITY_SETTINGS_TRANSPARENT_DESC:
Makes any windows opened by Discord transparent, useful for theming.
****WARNING:**** This will break **window snapping** on Windows. **Hardware acceleration** must be turned **off** on Linux. You may encounter issues and have black background in some cases, like when the window is cut off at the top, or the bottom due to monitor resolution or when devtools are open and docked. **Requires restart**.
VIZALITY_SETTINGS_TRANSPARENT_GLASSCORD: It looks like you have Glasscord installed, which means you can't update this setting directly within Vizality. Learn more about configuring Glasscord [here]({glasscordCfgUrl})
VIZALITY_SNIPPET_LINE1: Snippet from #css-snippets applied the {date, date, medium} at {date, time, medium}
VIZALITY_THEMES_UNINSTALL_SURE: Are you sure you want to uninstall this theme?
VIZALITY_THEMES_WIP1: This part of Vizality is not done yet.
VIZALITY_THEMES_WIP2: We're working on it and will release it before 2021.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_AWAITING_RELOAD_DESC: Some updates require a client reload to complete.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_DISABLE_MODAL: Are you sure you want to disable updates for this? You will have to perform updates manually.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_DISABLE_MODAL_ALL: Are you sure you want to disable updates? You will have to perform updates manually.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_FORCE_MODAL: Force updating might overwrite local edits you made to Vizality. If you made some, make sure to save them before! This action is irreversible.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_OPTS_AUTO_DESC: Vizality can download and install updates in background without annoying you too much. Note that updates will require user action if reload is required, or if there is a conflict.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_OPTS_CHANGE_LOGS_DESC: Missed the change log, or want to see it again?
VIZALITY_UPDATES_OPTS_CONCURRENCY_DESC: How many concurrent tasks Vizality will run in background to check for updates. Minimum 1. If unsure, leave 2.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_OPTS_DEBUG_DESC: Things that you may find useful for troubleshooting or flexing on some stats.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_OPTS_INTERVAL_DESC: How frequently Vizality will check for updates (in minutes). Minimum 10 minutes.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_OPTS_RELEASE_DESC: You can choose between the stable branch, or the development branch. Stable branch will only get major updates, security and critical updates. If unsure, stay on stable.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_OPTS_RELEASE_MODAL: Are you sure you want to change your release channel? Vizality will reload your Discord client.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_PAUSED_RESUME: They will resume on next reload.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_PAUSE_MODAL: Are you sure you want to pause updates? Vizality won't check for updates until next reload.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_SKIP_MODAL: Are you sure you want to skip this update? Vizality will wait for a newer version to get released before updating again.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_TOAST_AVAILABLE_DESC: Click "Update" to update now or "Open Updater" to find out more.
VIZALITY_UPDATES_UNSUPPORTED_DESC: You're using an unsupported build of Discord ({releaseChannel}). Plugins and themes might not fully work on this build, and you may experience crashes.
VIZALITY_UPDATE_PASSPHRASE_MODAL1: This passphrase will be used to encrypt your data before sending it to Vizality's servers. It's recommended to set one, but you can just leave this empty to send your data unencrypted.
VIZALITY_UPDATE_PASSPHRASE_MODAL2: If you're already using sync on other machines, put the same passphrase you used. **Using another passphrase will overwrite old data, so be careful**.
